I recently gave a talk on "Discovery Without Objectives" at RMIT University=
 in Melbourne, Australia (sponsored by ACM and NICTA).  My hosts Fabio Zamb=
etta and Xiaodong Li (who were great hosts) had the forethought to have the=
 talk videotaped and it's now on Youtube:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=
=3DtZBViI8ZaU0

While this talk is similar to (though not exactly the same =
as) my SPLASH-2010 talk, it does have some nice aspects:

-Availability on =
Youtube makes it easier to view and share.

-An extensive question and answ=
er period at the end includes some very interesting questions and good disc=
ussion.

ken
